alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Gila Bend; Kofa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 09 at 8:58AM MST until January 10 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM MST /MIDNIGHT PST/ TO 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Arizona and southeast California. * WHEN...From 1 AM MST /midnight PST/ to 9 AM MST /8 AM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
